| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| ACK | [hebasto](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29960#pullrequestreview-2022502664) |
| Concept ACK | [fanquake](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29960#issuecomment-2077167651), [alfonsoromanz](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29960#issuecomment-2077329585), [theuni](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29960#issuecomment-2077756588) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ð to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#29962](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29962) (RFC: depends: add release type to CMake builds by theuni)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Concept ACK. I just ran into this locally. I solved it using `V=1 VERBOSE=1`, but this makes sense too.
